definitions.definition: An instance of writing more data to the end of an existing file.
To hang or attach to, as by a string, so that the thing is suspended
definitions.example: An inscription was appended to the column.

definitions.definition: To add, as an accessory to the principal thing; to annex
definitions.example: notes appended to a book chapter

definitions.definition: To write more data to the end of a pre-existing file, string, or other object.
